trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADROOMGUIDE_00369_TTGUIDE_100_001<tab>Welcome to the Triple Triad Battlehall, where Triple Triad enthusiasts from all corners of Eorzea gather day and night to square off against one another in some of the most rousing card battles our realm has ever seen!

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADROOMGUIDE_00369_TTGUIDE_100_002<tab>You are of course welcome to challenge your fellow adventurers directly, or─if you would prefer not to be so forward─you can avail yourself of our convenient matching service free of charge!

TEXT_CMNGSCTRIPLETRIADROOMGUIDE_00369_TTGUIDE_100_003<tab>If you wish to learn more, one of our hall assistants would be happy to tell you everything you need to know. May your battles be fierce and fruitful!
